(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (CD One))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NNS things))
          (SBAR (IN that)
            (S
              (NP (PRP I))
              (ADVP (RB often))
              (VP (VB get)
                (VP (VBN asked)
                  (PP (IN during)
                    (NP (NNS consultations))))))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR (IN whether)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN condition))
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP (PRP they))
                (VP (VBP are)
                  (VP (VBG suffering)
                    (PP (IN from)))))))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN result))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (`` ``)
                  (NP (NNS heatiness))
                  ('' '')
                  (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                    (NP (NNP Juah))
                    (-RRB- -RRB-)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(is-12, One-1)
prep(One-1, of-2)
det(things-4, the-3)
pobj(of-2, things-4)
mark(asked-9, that-5)
nsubjpass(asked-9, I-6)
advmod(asked-9, often-7)
auxpass(asked-9, get-8)
dep(things-4, asked-9)
prep(asked-9, during-10)
pobj(during-10, consultations-11)
root(ROOT-0, is-12)
mark(result-22, whether-13)
det(condition-15, the-14)
nsubj(result-22, condition-15)
nsubj(suffering-18, they-16)
aux(suffering-18, are-17)
rcmod(condition-15, suffering-18)
prep(suffering-18, from-19)
cop(result-22, is-20)
det(result-22, a-21)
ccomp(is-12, result-22)
prep(result-22, of-23)
pobj(of-23, heatiness-25)
appos(heatiness-25, Juah-28)


(ROOT
  (S (CC And)
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is) (RB not)
      (NP
        (NP (RB just) (DT the) (JJ elderly))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBP ask)
              (S
                (NP (PRP me))
                (NP (DT this) (NN question)))))
          (, ,))))))


cc(elderly-7, And-1)
nsubj(elderly-7, it-2)
cop(elderly-7, is-3)
neg(elderly-7, not-4)
advmod(elderly-7, just-5)
det(elderly-7, the-6)
root(ROOT-0, elderly-7)
nsubj(ask-9, who-8)
rcmod(elderly-7, ask-9)
nsubj(question-12, me-10)
det(question-12, this-11)
xcomp(ask-9, question-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB also))
    (VP (VBP get)
      (VP (VBN asked)
        (PP (IN by)
          (NP
            (NP (NNS teenagers))
            (PP (IN at)
              (NP (NNS times)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubjpass(asked-4, I-1)
advmod(asked-4, also-2)
auxpass(asked-4, get-3)
root(ROOT-0, asked-4)
prep(asked-4, by-5)
pobj(by-5, teenagers-6)
prep(teenagers-6, at-7)
pobj(at-7, times-8)
